articles.title: O.J. Simpson Died $114M in Debt to Ron Goldman's Family, Attorney Says - PEOPLE
articles.description: An attorney for Ron Goldman’s father, David Cook, claimed that due to Simpson’s failure to pay the Goldman family after he was found liable in a wrongful death lawsuit in 1997, the money owed with interest has blown up to over $114 million as of this year.
articles.content: An attorney for Ron Goldmans father claims that O.J. Simpson, who was famously and controversially acquitted of murdering Ron and Nicole Brown Simpson, owed the Goldman family more than $100 million … [+2720 chars]
